      • copyAttachments

        public static java.util.List<TAttachmentBean> copyAttachments(java.lang.Integer workItemBeanOriginalId,
                                              java.lang.Integer workItemBeanCopyId,
                                              java.lang.String userOrSessionId,
                                              java.lang.Integer userID)
                                                       throws AttachBLException
        Copy the Attachments from the original workItemBean to the copied. It generates the db and the file information
        Parameters:
        workItemBeanOriginalId -
        workItemBeanCopyId -
        userOrSessionId - if it is known the copied id, the userId must be passed else the sessionId
        Returns:
        list of attachments if the copied id is null or -1, else null
        Throws:
        AttachBLException
